title: Lock Phone (wear)
summary: lock your phone from your android wear watch !
description: Lock phone allows you to lock your phone from your watch ----------------Lock phone also allows you to wake screen from your watch too !----------------* coming soon * .... unlock your phone and bypass your lock screen using the same app !----------------** How to use **1- open the app 2- it will ask you for device admin click activate and the app is now working -----------------** How to Uninstall **1- open the app 2- you will find green button click on it it will remove device admin so you can uninstall this app normally3- go to settings and uninstall it like any other app -----------------* this is my first wear app so waiting for reviews and if you have any negative review send to me on my email and i will fix it as soon as i can.-----------------* if you have any feature suggestion send it to me and i will add it :)
descriptionHTML:
Lock phone allows you to lock your phone from your watch
----------------
Lock phone also allows you to wake screen from your watch too !
----------------
* coming soon * .... unlock your phone and bypass your lock screen using the same app !
----------------
** How to use **
1- open the app
2- it will ask you for device admin click activate and the app is now working
-----------------
** How to Uninstall **
1- open the app
2- you will find green button click on it it will remove device admin so you can uninstall this app normally
3- go to settings and uninstall it like any other app
-----------------
* this is my first wear app so waiting for reviews and if you have any negative review send to me on my email and i will fix it as soon as i can.
-----------------
* if you have any feature suggestion send it to me and i will add it :)
comments: One of its kind that can wake the phone through the watch right now. Other apps are just locking. This one has both. There is one before like the WOCK that can unlock the phone but it removes the function on its update. So i can't wait for your update, You know the bypassing lockscreen part. So thanks a lot for making this wonderful  app. Like others said, This is what we are waiting for..,
Perfect! Finally the app that I was waiting for! Thank you!
recentChanges: ** New ** now your phone will lock itself if it was disconnected from your watch.
